contract_title: Comprehensive Repository Cleanup & Code Quality Enhancement

contract_details.description: Execute comprehensive cleanup mission across the entire repository to resolve merge conflicts, remove corrupted files, eliminate technical debt, and establish clean code standards. This mission addresses all outstanding cleanup tasks identified through systematic repository analysis.
contract_details.background: Repository analysis revealed multiple critical cleanup issues including merge conflicts in 633+ files, corrupted framework_disabled directory, empty/placeholder files, incomplete implementations, and deprecated code. This comprehensive cleanup is essential for maintaining code quality and operational stability.
objectives: Resolve all merge conflicts across 633+ files with conflicting changes
Remove corrupted framework_disabled directory and associated files
Eliminate empty/placeholder files and incomplete implementations
Clean up deprecated code and obsolete functionality
Resolve TODO/FIXME items in critical files
deliverables: Merge conflict resolution report with 633+ files cleaned
success_criteria: All 633+ merge conflicts resolved without data loss
All deprecated code eliminated or properly marked
All TODO/FIXME items addressed or documented
All functionality preserved through validation testing

dependencies: Repository analysis completed identifying 633+ merge conflicts
File system access confirmed for cleanup operations
Backup systems operational for data preservation

network_unlocks: Access to Repository Health Working Group

contract_history.details: Created comprehensive cleanup contract addressing 633+ merge conflicts, corrupted files, and repository health issues
